p.b: Conductive objects that touch the connectors of the battery cells cause a short circuit.

ul.li: Use an insulator (such as plywood) as a cover on the top of the battery before and during removal and installation.

note.p: If the battery is pulled from the pallet truck without a battery roller stand in position, the battery can tip over and cause a severe injury.

ul.li: Put the battery roller stand in position before moving the battery.

note.p: The incorrect battery weight and dimensions can make the pallet truck unstable.

ul.li: Install the same battery or a battery of equal weight and dimension in the pallet truck.
See the data plate for the minimum battery weight and dimension
